snippet: The British oil company plans to sell its 50 percent stake in its Russian joint venture, TNK-BP, after being approached by potential buyers of the holding. The announcement on Friday came as a surprise because TNK-BP has been a lucrative investment...
abstract: The British oil company plans to sell its 50 percent stake in its Russian joint venture, TNK-BP, after being approached by potential buyers of the holding. The announcement on Friday came as a surprise because TNK-BP has been a lucrative investment for BP, Julia Werdigier reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: BP to Seek Sale of Russian Venture TNK-BP
